title: Additional Internship Opportunities for International Students(Undergraduate
content: Attached is the internship opportunities that are available for international students(Undergraduate) and Korean students altogether for the 2010 Summer. For application please visit the Counseling and Student Development Center(Creative Learning B/D Room No. 504) with the attached application sheet.(Fill the applicant information, grade information, and KAIST dormitory application part but put the company application and advisor/internship professor approval part as a blank) The deadline is until 4 P.M, May 11th and students will be selected in first come, first served basis if they fulfil the requirements in the file. Also students who fulfil the requirements written in the attached file but don't have a major yet (Non-decalred major) or are registered in another major, visit the Counseling and Student Development Center and the Couseling and Student Development Center will discuss with the company's HR Team. For further questions, please call the Counseling and Student Development Center. (â˜Ž042-350-2461)
